item.description:
Looking for something to do this afternoon? Join P-Collective Member Allie, and check out the Providence Newspaper Guild Follies dress rehearsal! This is one of the most colorful events in RI, think White House correspondents dinner but on a Rhode Island size scale.Â  As you know, living in RI, the politics are always interesting!

The dress rehearsal is a full run-through of the show, minus the mystery guest. It begins at 3:30 p.m, doors open at 2:45, and will finish around 5 p.m. Refreshments will be severed afterwards. The dress rehearsal is free, and tickets are $65, so this is a great chance to check it out!

Location:
The location is Riverside Congregational Church, 15 Oak Ave, Riverside (East Providence). The church is on the corner of Oak Avenue and Bullocks Point Avenue. Parking in the church lot is limited but there is plenty of on street parking.

Directions:
From Providence, take Route 195 east, take Exit 6 and then a left onto Warren Avenue. At the first traffic light (Route 144) take a right, heading south. When that road ends in front of Bradley Hospital, take a left onto Bullocks Point Avenue and stay on that road until you come to the traffic light in village of Riverside. The church is about 500 feet past the light, on the right.

Tickets:
Tickets are still available for the show but going fast. If you're interested is attending the actual show, you can get tickets ($65) here: http://www.riguild.org/tickets.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: Allie will be hosting, but she is also in the Follies, so introduce yourself after the show if you go!
item.name: Sneak Peek TODAY! Providence Newspaper Guild Follies Dress Rehearsal! FREE!
